name: Lubriderm Fragrance Free Daily Moisture Lotion
description: A non-greasy, fragrance-free lotion designed for normal to dry skin, delivering long-lasting hydration.
longDescription: Lubriderm Moisture Lotion is a dermatologist-recommended formula that provides deep hydration without a greasy feel. Specially designed for normal to dry skin, this fragrance-free lotion absorbs quickly to deliver essential moisture, helping maintain the skin's natural balance. Perfect for daily use, it leaves your skin feeling smooth, refreshed, and comfortably hydrated throughout the day. The 14.8 fl oz bottle ensures you have a lasting supply for ongoing care.

features.title: Non-Greasy Formula
features.description: Lightweight lotion that absorbs quickly without leaving a residue.

features.title: Fragrance-Free
features.description: Ideal for sensitive skin, free of added fragrances that can cause irritation.

features.title: Long-Lasting Hydration
features.description: Provides sustained moisture to keep skin soft and smooth all day.

features.title: Dermatologist Recommended
features.description: Clinically tested formula trusted by professionals for effective care.

features.title: For Normal to Dry Skin
